main event: A metallic sphere approximately 10 feet in diameter was observed near Moody Air Force Base, Georgia, accompanied by grayish-white smoke.
interesting points: The object was described as coppery in color and had a sharply outlined shape., It traveled slower than known aircraft but left a considerable trail of smoke., The sighting was reported seven years after its occurrence., A dog was noted to have chased the object., The observer noted the object's reflection of sunlight, which initially made it appear smaller.
witness description: The witness was climbing in a T-33 aircraft when they noticed the object at approximately 35-40 degrees above the horizon.
